config.text: Write file even if it exists

script:
on run argv
  set overwrite to (system attribute "overwrite") is "1"
  set targetDir to (POSIX file (system attribute "save_in"))
  set sourcePaths to {}

  repeat with itemNumber from 1 to count of argv
    try
      set pathString to item itemNumber of argv
      copy POSIX file pathString to the end of sourcePaths
    end try
  end repeat

  if overwrite then
    tell application "Finder" to move sourcePaths to folder targetDir with replacing
  else
    tell application "Finder" to move sourcePaths to folder targetDir
  end if
end run
